{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-C |revision=1+ (1GB) Rev 0.4 |asin=B018WDR45A |price=37 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |est_release_date=08/2015 <!-- 20160226 --> |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=2.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=0.8 |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S805 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63CFR-RDC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB VBUS controller;On Semi;NCP380;;2;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, Over-voltage, Over-current, Reverse-voltage protection IC;On Semi;NPC372;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module connector, HDMI, GPIO, I2S, RTC, IR receiver |stock_boot=U-Boot;00000;-geb22ea4-dirty; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.80-121;Ubuntu 14.04.3; |tp_firmware=Android 4.0, Armbian, Arch Linux (Arm), |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=odroid |default_pass=odroid |oui_eth=00:1E:06 }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-C1+}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/shop/odroid-c1/ Product page]
:Can also be powered via USB OTG.
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB and 64GB available.
{{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-c1/odroid-c1 ''ODROID-C1'' on '''ODROID Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/11/odroid-c1-plus/ ''Hardkernel ODROID-C1+ Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S805 @1.5GHz :SoC: Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A5) :GPU: Mali-400 MP2 @600MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 4.5 connector *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM
===See also=== *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz <!-- *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - "Samsung" Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU -->
